Method Detail

getPole

public int getPole()
This method accesses the int PDT value that stores the polar value of a particular Pole Object. This field is set by the (private) constructor during program start up, as no new Pole Objects can be created, since the only necessary Pole values are stored in the static final Pole Objects within this class.

Returns:
The int value associated with this Pole Object.

isAttracted

public boolean isAttracted(Pole p)
This method returns a value that dictates whether a given Pole and this Pole are attracted to each other.

Parameters:
p - The given Pole Object for this method to compare.
Returns:
true if the Objects are attracted, false otherwise.

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
